operation.title: Operation
operation.description: Explicit operation to perform: "create", "read", "update", "delete", or "find". If not specified, operation will be inferred from context: has fieldDataJson + recordId = update, has fieldDataJson only = create, has recordId only = read, has searchTerm/filtersJson = find, has recordId only (no data/search) = delete.

fieldDataJson.title: Field Data JSON
fieldDataJson.description: JSON string containing Opportunity field data. For create: {"Name":"Q4 Deal","StageName":"Prospecting","Amount":50000,"CloseDate":"2024-12-31"}. For update: {"StageName":"Closed Won","Amount":55000}. For bulk operations: [{"Name":"Deal 1"},{"Name":"Deal 2"}]. Required for create/update operations. The agent should construct this JSON from natural language user input.

recordId.title: Record ID
recordId.description: The Salesforce record ID (15 or 18 character) of the Opportunity. Required for read/update/delete operations. Format: 18-character ID like "006xx000003DGbYAAW". For update, can be omitted if Name is provided in fieldDataJson for automatic resolution. The agent should resolve this from opportunity name when possible rather than asking the user for an ID.

searchTerm.title: Search Term
searchTerm.description: Text to search for in Opportunity fields (Name, Description, etc.). Used for find operations. Example: "Q4 Deal" or "Enterprise". IMPORTANT: If the user wants to find an opportunity but hasn't provided a search term, ask them for the opportunity name, account name, or other identifying information BEFORE calling this action. Do not call find operation without a searchTerm or filtersJson.

filtersJson.title: Filters JSON
filtersJson.description: JSON string of exact-match filters for find operations. Can be single object {"fieldApiName":"StageName","value":"Prospecting"} or array [{"fieldApiName":"StageName","value":"Prospecting"}]. IMPORTANT: If the user wants to find an opportunity but hasn't provided specific filters, ask them for details like account name, stage, or amount range BEFORE calling this action. Do not call find operation without a searchTerm or filtersJson.

searchLimit.title: Search Limit
searchLimit.description: Maximum number of records to return for find operations (default: 5, max: 20).

accountName.title: Account Name
accountName.description: Account name to resolve to AccountId for the Opportunity. If provided, the system will search for an Account with this name and link the Opportunity to it.

confirm.title: Confirm
confirm.description: For create/update: Set to false to preview only without committing. Default (true): Commits immediately. For delete: Set to true to actually delete. Default (false): Returns confirmation message first. The agent should first call delete with confirm=false, ask the user, then call again with confirm=true if confirmed.
